scenarios.title: App crashes when opening lessons
scenarios.description: User's app crashes immediately when they try to start any lesson. Works fine for browsing but crashes on lesson start.

scenarios.title: No audio in pronunciation exercises
scenarios.description: User cannot hear any audio during pronunciation exercises but other app audio works fine. Device volume is up and other apps play audio normally.

scenarios.title: Progress not syncing between devices
scenarios.description: User completed 5 lessons on their phone but when they open the app on their tablet, the progress isn't showing. Both devices are logged into the same account.

scenarios.title: Cannot log in with Google account
scenarios.description: User trying to log in with Google account but gets 'authentication failed' error. Previously worked fine for 6 months.

scenarios.title: App running very slowly on older device
scenarios.description: User reports app is extremely slow on their 3-year-old Android phone. Takes 30+ seconds to load lessons and exercises lag significantly.

scenarios.title: Password reset email not received
scenarios.description: User clicked 'forgot password' but hasn't received reset email after 2 hours. Checked spam folder. Needs to access account urgently.

scenarios.title: Cannot change email address
scenarios.description: User wants to update email address in profile but gets error message when trying to save changes. New email is valid and not used by another account.

scenarios.title: Request to delete account and all data
scenarios.description: User wants to permanently delete their account and all associated learning data due to privacy concerns. Has active Plus subscription.

scenarios.title: Credit card declined but subscription shows active
scenarios.description: User's credit card was declined last week but their Plus subscription still shows as active. Concerned about access being cut off suddenly.

scenarios.title: Refund request for annual subscription
scenarios.description: User purchased annual Plus subscription 2 weeks ago but isn't satisfied with the content quality. Requesting refund under money-back guarantee.

scenarios.title: Upgrade to Max not working
scenarios.description: User is trying to upgrade from Plus to Max subscription but payment keeps failing. Same credit card works for other purchases.

scenarios.title: Cannot add family member to plan
scenarios.description: User has Family Max plan but cannot add their teenage daughter. Gets error when sending invite email.

scenarios.title: Lost 50-day streak after completing lesson
scenarios.description: User completed their daily lesson at 11:30 PM but woke up to find their 50-day streak was broken. Very upset and demotivated.

scenarios.title: Lessons suddenly became too difficult
scenarios.description: User was progressing well through Spanish basics but the difficulty jumped dramatically. Now failing most exercises and feeling frustrated.

scenarios.title: Achievement not unlocked despite meeting requirements
scenarios.description: User completed 7 consecutive days of learning but 'Week Warrior' achievement hasn't unlocked. All lessons show as completed in their profile.

scenarios.title: Speech recognition not working correctly
scenarios.description: User's pronunciation exercises always mark answers as incorrect even when they sound exactly like the example. Other users confirm their pronunciation is good.

scenarios.title: Incorrect translation in German lesson
scenarios.description: User found translation error in German lesson 'Family Members'. App shows 'Bruder' translates to 'sister' but it means 'brother'. Native speaker confirms error.

scenarios.title: Poor audio quality in French pronunciation
scenarios.description: User reports French pronunciation audio is very quiet and unclear compared to other languages. Makes it difficult to learn proper pronunciation.

scenarios.title: Lesson series incomplete
scenarios.description: User reached end of 'Business Spanish' skill tree but it ends abruptly at lesson 15. Seems like more lessons should be there based on skill description.

scenarios.title: Request to add Korean language
scenarios.description: User really wants to learn Korean but it's not available in the app. Willing to participate in beta testing if Korean is being developed.

scenarios.title: Request offline mode for free users
scenarios.description: User travels frequently for work and would like some offline capability as a free user. Willing to watch ads or pay small fee for limited offline access.

scenarios.title: Request for dyslexia-friendly features
scenarios.description: User has dyslexia and struggles with current text presentation. Requests options for dyslexia-friendly fonts and color schemes.

scenarios.title: Cannot add friends to leaderboard
scenarios.description: User trying to add friends to compete with but friend requests aren't working. Search function finds friends but invite button doesn't respond.

scenarios.title: Report inappropriate community post
scenarios.description: User wants to report community forum post containing inappropriate language and harassment toward other learners.

scenarios.title: Downloaded lessons not working offline
scenarios.description: User downloaded lessons for airplane trip but they won't open without internet connection. All lessons show as downloaded with checkmarks.

scenarios.title: Not receiving daily reminder notifications
scenarios.description: User has notifications enabled but hasn't received daily learning reminders for past week. Other app notifications work fine.

scenarios.title: Student discount not applying
scenarios.description: College student submitted verification documents for 50% discount but still being charged full price. Documents were approved via email.

scenarios.title: Placement test put me at wrong level
scenarios.description: User with intermediate Spanish knowledge was placed in advanced level. Lessons are too difficult and user wants to restart at intermediate.

scenarios.title: Cultural videos not loading
scenarios.description: User cannot watch cultural insight videos in Japanese course. Video player appears but shows loading spinner indefinitely.

scenarios.title: Lost access to 2FA device
scenarios.description: User's phone broke and they can't access their authenticator app. Need to log in to account but 2FA is enabled. Has backup codes but they're on the broken phone.

scenarios.title: Culturally inappropriate content in lesson
scenarios.description: User from Mexico finds stereotypical and outdated cultural references in 'Mexican Culture' lesson that are offensive and inaccurate.

scenarios.title: App using excessive mobile data
scenarios.description: User notices app has used 2GB of mobile data this month despite being on wifi most of the time. Concerned about data overage charges.

scenarios.title: Streak freeze not working
scenarios.description: User activated streak freeze before going on vacation but their 45-day streak still broke. Freeze was purchased and activated correctly.

scenarios.title: Cannot cancel subscription
scenarios.description: User wants to cancel Plus subscription but cancel button in settings doesn't work. Subscription renews tomorrow and they want to avoid charge.

scenarios.title: Speaking exercises freeze during recording
scenarios.description: When user starts speaking exercise, the app freezes during recording phase. Have to force close app and restart lesson multiple times.

scenarios.title: Completed lesson but didn't receive XP
scenarios.description: User completed French lesson 'Food & Drinks' with 90% accuracy but received 0 XP. Lesson shows as completed in progress but no XP was added.

scenarios.title: Grammar explanation unclear in Italian
scenarios.description: User confused by subjunctive mood explanation in Italian advanced course. Examples don't match the rule description and it's causing frustration.

scenarios.title: Accidentally created duplicate account
scenarios.description: User created account with Facebook login but already had account with email. Now has two accounts with different progress and wants to merge them.

scenarios.title: App draining battery quickly
scenarios.description: User notices phone battery drains 30% faster when using Treslingo compared to other apps. Even when app is closed, battery usage shows high consumption.

scenarios.title: Story mode chapters locked incorrectly
scenarios.description: User completed all prerequisite lessons but next story chapter remains locked. Previous chapters are completed and skill level requirements are met.

scenarios.title: Subscription price increased without notice
scenarios.description: User's monthly Plus subscription increased from $9.99 to $12.99 without any email notification. Wants explanation and possible refund of difference.

scenarios.title: Request for dark mode option
scenarios.description: User prefers studying at night and finds current interface too bright. Requests dark mode option to reduce eye strain during evening sessions.

scenarios.title: Cannot search for specific lessons
scenarios.description: Search function in lesson library returns no results even for lessons user knows exist. Tried searching for 'greetings', 'family', and specific lesson names.

scenarios.title: Progress mixing between languages
scenarios.description: User learning both Spanish and French but XP and achievements are getting mixed up between languages. Spanish progress shows French vocabulary.

scenarios.title: Study group invite not working
scenarios.description: User created study group for Spanish learners but invite links aren't working. Friends click link but get 'group not found' error.

scenarios.title: iOS widget not updating progress
scenarios.description: User's iPhone widget still shows yesterday's progress despite completing today's lesson. Widget shows 45-day streak but actual streak is 46 days.

scenarios.title: British accent not recognized properly
scenarios.description: User with British accent consistently marked wrong in speaking exercises despite correct pronunciation. App seems optimized for American English pronunciation only.

scenarios.title: Setting up account for 12-year-old
scenarios.description: Parent wants to create account for 12-year-old child but uncertain about parental controls and privacy settings. Needs guidance on COPPA compliance.

scenarios.title: Gift subscription not activated
scenarios.description: User purchased annual Plus subscription as gift for friend 3 days ago. Friend received email but gift code isn't working during activation.

scenarios.title: Vocabulary review showing wrong definitions
scenarios.description: During vocabulary review, user notices several words showing incorrect definitions. 'Perro' (Spanish for dog) shows definition for 'cat' and vice versa.

scenarios.title: Apple Watch app not syncing
scenarios.description: User's Apple Watch Treslingo app shows different progress than iPhone app. Watch shows 3-day streak while iPhone shows correct 15-day streak.

scenarios.title: Request to export learning data
scenarios.description: User wants to export their learning data and vocabulary lists for personal records before potentially switching to different app.

scenarios.title: Portuguese lessons use Brazilian variant only
scenarios.description: User from Portugal notices all Portuguese lessons use Brazilian Portuguese exclusively. Requests European Portuguese option or at least acknowledgment of differences.

scenarios.title: Special characters not typing correctly
scenarios.description: User cannot type accented characters (ñ, é, ü) in Spanish lessons on Android. Virtual keyboard doesn't show accent options during exercises.

scenarios.title: Legendary lessons too difficult
scenarios.description: User completed entire German skill tree but legendary lessons are impossibly difficult. Getting 20% accuracy despite being fluent in regular lessons.

scenarios.title: Cannot make profile private
scenarios.description: User wants to make learning profile completely private but privacy settings don't seem to be working. Still appears in friend searches and leaderboards.

scenarios.title: Setting up corporate account for team
scenarios.description: HR manager wants to purchase Treslingo subscriptions for 50 employees. Needs bulk pricing and centralized management dashboard for company.

scenarios.title: Cannot cast lessons to TV
scenarios.description: User wants to practice lessons on TV using Chromecast but casting option doesn't appear. Other apps cast fine from same device.

scenarios.title: AI conversation partner not responding
scenarios.description: User in Max subscription tries to use AI conversation feature but partner never responds to messages. Feature worked last week but stopped suddenly.

scenarios.title: Missing pronunciation guide for Mandarin tones
scenarios.description: User struggling with Mandarin tones but pronunciation exercises don't include tone markers or detailed tone explanation. Critical for Chinese learning.

scenarios.title: Audio lessons not working in CarPlay
scenarios.description: User wants to practice listening exercises during commute using CarPlay but audio lessons don't play through car speakers. Music apps work fine.

scenarios.title: Lost progress after phone replacement
scenarios.description: User got new phone and logged into same account but 6 months of progress is missing. Shows as if starting fresh despite being logged into correct account.

scenarios.title: Request for podcast recommendations
scenarios.description: User at intermediate Spanish level wants podcast recommendations within app to continue learning during commute. Prefers integration with current progress.

scenarios.title: Test out feature not working properly
scenarios.description: User wants to test out of basic French skills but test-out option is grayed out despite having intermediate knowledge from university classes.

scenarios.title: Audio delay with Bluetooth headphones
scenarios.description: User experiences 2-second audio delay when using Bluetooth headphones with pronunciation exercises. Makes it impossible to follow along properly.

scenarios.title: Need tax invoice for business expense
scenarios.description: User needs proper tax invoice for Plus subscription to claim as business expense. Current receipt doesn't include required tax information for their country.

scenarios.title: Technology vocabulary is outdated
scenarios.description: User noticed technology section in English business course uses terms from 10+ years ago. Missing modern terms like 'cryptocurrency', 'AI', 'cloud computing'.

scenarios.title: Language exchange partner matching not working
scenarios.description: User wants to practice with native Spanish speakers but partner matching feature hasn't found any matches in 2 weeks despite many active users.

scenarios.title: App not working with VPN enabled
scenarios.description: User needs VPN for work security but Treslingo shows connection errors when VPN is active. All other apps work fine with same VPN configuration.

scenarios.title: Hearts depleting too quickly
scenarios.description: Free user finds hearts system too restrictive. Loses all 5 hearts within 10 minutes due to difficult exercises and has to wait hours to continue.

scenarios.title: Account locked due to suspicious activity
scenarios.description: User's account was automatically locked due to 'suspicious activity' but they only logged in from new tablet. Need account restored urgently for exam preparation.

scenarios.title: Request for handwriting practice feature
scenarios.description: User learning Chinese wants handwriting practice for characters. Current typing exercises don't help with learning proper stroke order and character formation.

scenarios.title: App blocks screen recording for tutorials
scenarios.description: User wants to create tutorial videos for their students but app blocks screen recording. Needs permission or workaround for educational use.

scenarios.title: Need medical Spanish for healthcare worker
scenarios.description: Nurse needs medical Spanish vocabulary for patient communication but current health-related lessons are too basic. Needs specialized medical terminology.

scenarios.title: Need official certificate for language proficiency
scenarios.description: User completed intermediate German course and needs official certificate for job application. Current completion badges aren't accepted by employer.

scenarios.title: App using excessive device memory
scenarios.description: User's phone becomes slow and unresponsive after using Treslingo. Task manager shows app using 3GB RAM even after closing. Requires phone restart.

scenarios.title: Charged different amount due to currency conversion
scenarios.description: User in Canada expected to pay $9.99 CAD but was charged $9.99 USD on credit card. Wants clarification on pricing for Canadian customers.

scenarios.title: Receiving unwanted messages from another user
scenarios.description: User receiving inappropriate direct messages from another learner despite not being friends. Wants to block user and report harassment.

scenarios.title: Request for adjustable audio speed
scenarios.description: User wants to slow down native speaker audio beyond current 'turtle' speed option. Current slow speed still too fast for beginner comprehension.

scenarios.title: Recommendation algorithm suggesting wrong content
scenarios.description: User consistently gets recommended beginner lessons despite being at advanced level. Algorithm seems stuck and not adapting to actual performance.

scenarios.title: Screen auto-locks during long lessons
scenarios.description: User's phone screen locks during longer lessons causing progress loss. Needs to restart lesson from beginning. Auto-lock disabled in settings doesn't work.

scenarios.title: Need more cultural context for idioms
scenarios.description: User learning Italian idioms but lessons don't explain when and where to use them appropriately. Cultural context missing for proper usage.

scenarios.title: Need to close account for deceased family member
scenarios.description: User's spouse passed away and they need to close the deceased person's Treslingo account. Has death certificate and account access information.

scenarios.title: No option to slow down lesson pace
scenarios.description: Elderly user finds lesson pace too fast and overwhelming. Needs option to extend time limits and reduce number of exercises per session.

scenarios.title: External keyboard not working with iPad app
scenarios.description: User's Bluetooth keyboard doesn't register keystrokes in Treslingo iPad app. Keyboard works fine in other apps and for system navigation.

scenarios.title: Transfer subscription to new email address
scenarios.description: User changed jobs and lost access to work email address. Wants to transfer Plus subscription to personal email but keep all progress.

scenarios.title: Request for built-in dictionary feature
scenarios.description: User wants quick word lookup within lessons without leaving app. Current process of switching to dictionary app breaks learning flow.

scenarios.title: Spaced repetition schedule too aggressive
scenarios.description: User overwhelmed by vocabulary review schedule. Gets 50+ words to review daily which takes longer than learning new content.

scenarios.title: Request for sign language courses
scenarios.description: Deaf user requests American Sign Language course addition. Current audio-heavy format excludes deaf and hard-of-hearing learners.

scenarios.title: Notifications in wrong language
scenarios.description: User receiving daily reminder notifications in Spanish instead of English despite English being set as interface language.

scenarios.title: Leaderboard showing incorrect rankings
scenarios.description: User has 2000 XP this week but leaderboard shows them in 5th place behind friends with lower XP totals. Rankings don't match actual scores.

scenarios.title: Cannot access lessons despite meeting requirements
scenarios.description: User completed all prerequisite lessons for 'Advanced Conversations' but section remains locked. All dependencies show as completed in skill tree.

scenarios.title: Promotional code not working at checkout
scenarios.description: User has valid promotional code for 3 months free Plus subscription but code shows as 'invalid' during checkout process.

scenarios.title: Request for built-in study session timer
scenarios.description: User wants to track exact study time with built-in timer feature. Current time tracking isn't detailed enough for personal goal setting.

scenarios.title: App doesn't work properly in split-screen mode
scenarios.description: User wants to take notes while learning but app doesn't display correctly in Android split-screen mode. Interface elements overlap and become unusable.
